pr_title: cluescrolls: Add X Marks The Spot quest solutions

timeline.message: cluescrolls: Add X Marks The Spot quest solutions

timeline.bodyText: You should verify the menu type before assuming the id is an item id. I think the old code works because you can getItemComposition() with any id and it always returns a non null item with the name "null" if the id isn't valid. However this is bad practice and we should prefer to remove that whenever we see it.
timeline.author: Adam-
Adam-
